title: Browser compatibility
description: Test if your browser supports File API needed for bulk response downloads.
step2: Allow "This site to view and copy files"
clickToSelect: Click to select a directory for testing. You will be prompted to grant permissions.
fileSystemRead: File System Read Ask For URLs
fileSystemWrite: File System Write Ask For URLs
